name: Bubble Blaster (Issacboy123)
description:
You need to pop as many bubbles as possible to increase your score! However, you need to avoid popping the bubbles that decrease your score!

 You are a bullet. You can pop bubbles.

Controls:
W or Up arrow key to turn your bullet upwards.
A or Left arrow key to turn your bullet leftwards
S or Down arrow key to turn your bullet downwards
D or Right arrow key to turn your bullet rightwards.

Bubbles:
 You need to pop positive bubbles to increase your score!

 Avoid popping negative bubbles as they decrease your score!

 Although rare, popping the time increase bubbles can increase the range on your bullet!
